title: Uruguay players involved in alleged assault on night out following World Cup exit
text:
Members of Uruguay's World Cup squad have been captured on CCTV engaging in reported antisocial behaviour after a drunken night out in Kumamoto following their valiant 35-13 loss to Wales on Sunday.

Police were called to Club Bacon Egg, situated just across the Tsuboi River from Kumamoto Castle, in the early hours of Monday morning following reports of drunk and disorderly behaviour at the club.

The nightspot shared a video on Twitter showing a member of staff being tackled to the ground by a member of the public, as well as a customer throwing a beer towards the DJ booth.
